problem_statement: Healthcare providers lack real-time threat detection for ransomware targeting IoT medical devices, leading to potential patient data breaches and service disruption.
Educational institutions struggle to provide personalized learning experiences at scale, resulting in students falling behind without targeted intervention.
Supply chain management lacks transparency and traceability, leading to counterfeiting issues and inefficient logistics tracking.
Financial institutions need quantum-resistant cryptography solutions to protect sensitive data from future quantum computing threats.
Urban areas face challenges in monitoring and reducing carbon emissions in real-time, hindering climate action initiatives.
